snippet.title: Spear Song — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
An ancient Slavic knights fight against evil in a turn-based tactical combat!
Wishlist available! https://shorturl.at/pQU26

Spear Song inspired by Slavic folklore and fairytales. Rich and catchy graphics will allow you to dive into this fantasy kingdom with knights fighting against authentic Slavic villains. Lead a small detachment of various characters and combine their skills to defeat the enemies!

Evil spirits have invaded the kingdom, ghouls roam the fields, and a giant three-headed dragon terrorizes the countryside. Troops of knights continuously going on crusades from the capital to clear the lands from evil creatures. All previous attempts have failed, but now the fate of the kingdom is in your hands. Will you be able to defeat the enemies of your land and crush the hordes of monsters? Or you’ll need to start all over again?

- Dive into the fairytale! Bright stylized graphics inspired by Slavic folk art.
- Lead the squad! Tactical gameplay based on combining the skills of units and manipulating the enemy’s position on the battlefield.
- Write your legend! Each attempt to save the kingdom presents new randomly generated journey.
- Upgrade your knights! Different characters have unique skills and great opportunities for combinations.
- Take care of your warriors! The dead cannot be returned. If you lose, you’ll need to start all over again with a new squad.


Our socials:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/spear_song_game
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/spear_song_game
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spear_song_game
